title.rendered: August’s Top Mobile Phone Deals on Three

content.rendered:
As you all know by now, we love a good mobile phone deal here at Fonehouse. So, we thought we should kick off August by sharing some of our favourite deals that we currently have available on Three.

Three is one of the UK’s biggest providers and their 4G network spans 99.8% of the UK’s population. So, you can be sure with a deal on this network that you’ll get your money’s worth and more when it comes to coverage. Not only that but Three have started their 5G rollout in the UK – so all you need to do is make sure you have a 5G ready device and you’re ready to go. With such great coverage, you’ll have all your family and friends wanting to jump on board and with Three they can. Three offer free tethering so you can all stay connected using your pay monthly data allowance.

Not only that but with Three you can use your minutes, data and texts across 71 countries worldwide, for no extra cost! You can even get free EasyJet upgrades – perfect for getting back to travelling.

There is something to suit every lifestyle and budget with our selection of deals – that’s why we think they’re so great! You can check out some of our favourites below.

  1. iPhone 12 Pro 5G 128GB

This phone was the flagship release for Apple in 2020 – and it did not disappoint. Apple really did raise the standards with this release – particularly improving the camera and durability. Not only that but the range has a pretty impressive price tag and colourway – as well as being 5G ready.

Enough about the phone though, what about the deal? With our top Three deal on this iPhone you can get:

  • Unlimited Data
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts
  • 24 Month Contract

All for £50 per month with no upfront cost!

  1. iPhone 12 64GB

You can trust that you’re going to get the very best of Apple technology along with a classic design with this smartphone. There are so many new improvements to this smartphone as well as iOS 14 bringing a bunch of new features including 5G technology

On Three you can get the following for £38 per month, with no upfront cost:

  • 100GB Data
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts
  • 24 Month Contract
  1. Xiaomi Mi 11 5G 256GB

This phone really does have it all – featuring an impressive blend of the best specifications and design, as well as incredible features and top performance. What’s not to love? It has top of the range charging features and video recording if you fancy yourself a director.

Not only that, but with this deal you can get 256GB of storage – perfect for shooting those high-quality cinema-like videos. For £44 per month, and no upfront cost you can get:

  • 100GB Data
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts
  • 24 Month Contract

And it doesn’t stop there, with this deal you can get Mi Watch, worth £119!

  1. iPhone 12 mini 5G 64GB

This small and sleek iPhone stole the show in 2020. Perfect for anyone who loves a good tech spec but also wants to bag themselves a bargain. The iPhone 12’s smaller sibling has everything you need all for a lower cost – and is perfect for those who a love a more compact design.

With Three, you can get it for an even better price! Available for £32 per month, and no upfront cost you can bag yourself:

  • 100GB Data
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts
  • 24 Month Contract
  1. Samsung Galaxy S20 FE 5G 128GB

This was the first release of Samsung Galaxy’s ‘Fan Edition’ – featuring everything fans of the Galaxy know and love but all for that slightly lower price tag. It still has all the best features you would expect, and even a variety of fun colours and designs to choose from.

You can get this phone for a real bargain on Three, paying £27 per month with no upfront cost, for:

  • 30GB Data
  • Unlimited Minutes
  • Unlimited Texts
  • 24 Month Contract

We hope we have provided you with some inspiration for August – but of course you know that isn’t all we have up our sleeve, so make sure to check out the rest of our deals across the site.
